template.p: From the CRM, schedule a meeting. As you meet the client, you can create a quotation and use the product catalog. to easily present products to the client and record his order.
To create a quotation, select the template "CCTV Installation Setup". That fills in two products:
As the customer confirms the sales order, one task will be created in the 'Installation Service'.
You can deliver the 1 product ("CCTV Camera") from the inventory application. Use the barcode scanner, or the backend, up to you.
Warranty days for above product will be calculated at the date of delivery, based on the warranty period defined on the product.
Assign the field service engineer on the task of "Installation Service".

After the planning, field service engineer will visit the client place and start working on installation, they move the task "In Progress" and then "Done" when it's finished and sign the service report.
If the product is in warranty and customer has any complaint, we can repair the product and generate the invoice if required.

ul.li: Go to website and Helpdesk form
In the form, the customer describes the product ('ThinkPad X1 Carbon 35.56cms - 12th Gen Intel i7'), the serial number('CNC012345'), and submit the ticket.
support ticket will be created from backend.
Open the ticket from backend, enter the serial number and the warranty date will be displayed.
Create the Repair order from Helpdesk- >Repair Order.
Take the product in our internal location from customer (WH/Repair).
Repair the product, they move the Order to "Under Repair", and then "Repaired" when it's finished.

template.blockquote: If the product is under warranty then no need to create the invoice and if the product is out of warranty then the user can send the quotation for the repair. Once the customer confirms the rate then the user can start repairing and after the repair, we will give the customer an invoice.
